text:
[Verse]
Underneath a sky so vast
Wishing on the stars that pass
Nighttime whispers secrets told
Dreams unfold as hearts grow bold

[Verse 2]
Moonlight paints the world in blue
Dancing shadows chase the view
Echoes of the night will sing
Here we find our everything

[Chorus]
Starry night dreams
In our hearts they gleam
Starry night dreams
Nothing's what it seems

[Verse 3]
Walking through the cosmic light
Every step a pure delight
Velvet sky and endless space
Holding on to love's embrace

[Verse 4]
Stardust sprinkled through our hair
Magic moments in the air
Eyes that shine with worlds untold
In this night
We break the mold

[Bridge]
Pathways of light
Guide us through the night
Holding on tight
Everything's all right
title: Starry Night Dreams
